name: Bridge does not cross over water.
Widespread minor or isolated moderate defects.
Moderate defects; bridge and approach roadway are not threatened.
Widespread moderate or isolated major defects; bridge and/or approach roadway is threatened.
Major defects; bridge or approach roadway is seriously threatened. description typically necessitates more frequent monitoring, load restrictions, and/or corrective actions.

Major defects. Bridge or approach roadway is severely threatened. description typically necessitates frequent monitoring, significant load restrictions, and/or corrective actions in order to keep the bridge open.
Bridge is closed to traffic due to channel description. Channel rehabilitation may return the bridge to service.
Bridge is closed due to channel condition, and is beyond corrective action. Bridge location or design can no longer accommodate the channel, and bridge replacement is needed to restore service.
